description: API for payment close icon retrieval

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Payment ID is assigned upon registration in successful transactions

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, which is identity pre-processed to determine if it is allowed to access this API

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Digital signature (Generated as shown in Sec. /openapi/payment/get/getSignStr) using all non-null, non-empty parameters in alphabetical order

response_fields.name: ret
response_fields.description: Integer error key 4/5/6/98. Simply 4 for error Response

response_fields.name: timestamp
response_fields.description: Integer error number 4/5/6/98. Simply 4 for error Response

response_fields.name: session_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request/by each session

children.name: icon_path
children.description: The close icon path of the icon

children.name: side_pic
children.description: The side icon of the site in the detecting key.2 side detail

children.name: other_pic
children.description: Request others clientRep for an icon
